thread.title: Peru's president offers resignation on eve of impeachment vote

title: Peru's president offers resignation on eve of impeachment vote
text:
Peru's president offers resignation on eve of impeachment vote  14 
Peru's President Pedro Pablo Kuczynski offered to resign on Wednesday after vote-buying allegations ensnared his centre-right government on the eve of an impeachment vote, capping months of political turmoil in one of Latin America's most stable economies.   
Peru's President Pedro Pablo Kuczynski offered to resign on Wednesday after vote-buying allegations ensnared his centre-right government on the eve of an impeachment vote, capping months of political turmoil in one of Latin America's most stable economies.  //reut.rs/2pueTNS
